text:
ありがとう。
俺 毎日
料理してんだ
一人暮らし
だから
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 2.82%;top: 1.97%;width: 15.53%;height: 19.18%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
あっ! ヘーゼルも
子供の頃
一人暮らし
だったよ
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 44.31%;top: 0.24%;width: 19.15%;height: 9.98%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 68.03%;top: 0.63%;width: 11.49%;height: 4.56%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
俺達の
ベビーシッター!
彼女もデーモン
なんだ!
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 82.82%;top: 0.79%;width: 15.21%;height: 10.61%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
デーモンなら
当然
一人暮らし
だろ
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 43.88%;top: 22.33%;width: 12.87%;height: 15.49%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 88.24%;top: 26.18%;width: 7.45%;height: 3.93%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 88.35%;top: 41.04%;width: 3.72%;height: 1.97%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
ねぇ皆!
話に混ざって
いい?
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 2.82%;top: 47.48%;width: 20.53%;height: 7.78%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
いいとも!
ロムの
一人暮らしに
ついて
話して
たんだ!
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 21.33%;top: 60.61%;width: 13.19%;height: 14.23%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
妹が
いるけど
僕もお互い
一人暮らし
だよ!
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 55.27%;top: 48.43%;width: 13.19%;height: 16.98%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
両親が
ハネムーン
だからね
もう2年に
なるよ!
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 85.69%;top: 48.74%;width: 13.13%;height: 17.30%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 19.31%;top: 76.81%;width: 17.02%;height: 7.31%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 27.61%;top: 91.43%;width: 11.49%;height: 5.66%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;
